name: Featured collection #13
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign collection = section.settings.collection
  assign collection_show = section.settings.collection_show

  assign layout = section.settings.layout
  assign layout_mobile = section.settings.layout_mobile
  assign layout_gap = section.settings.layout_gap
  assign layout_gap_mobile = section.settings.layout_gap_mobile

  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile

  assign tag_custom = section.settings.tag_custom
  assign tag_font = section.settings.tag_font
  assign tag_size = section.settings.tag_size
  assign tag_size_mobile = section.settings.tag_size_mobile
  assign tag_height = section.settings.tag_height
  assign tag_color = section.settings.tag_color  
  assign tag_align = section.settings.tag_align
  assign tag_align_mobile = section.settings.tag_align_mobile

  assign dots_size = section.settings.dots_size
  assign dots_size_mobile = section.settings.dots_size_mobile
  assign dots_show_desktop = section.settings.dots_show_desktop
  assign dots_show_mobile = section.settings.dots_show_mobile
  assign dots_color = section.settings.dots_color

  assign product_padding_horizontal = section.settings.product_padding_horizontal
  assign product_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.product_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign product_padding_vertical = section.settings.product_padding_vertical
  assign product_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.product_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign product_radius = section.settings.product_radius
  assign product_border_thickness = section.settings.product_border_thickness
  assign product_border_color = section.settings.product_border_color
  assign product_bg_color = section.settings.product_bg_color

  assign content_image_ratio = section.settings.content_image_ratio
  assign content_image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.content_image_ratio_mobile
  assign content_image_border_thickness = section.settings.content_image_border_thickness
  assign content_image_border_color = section.settings.content_image_border_color
  assign content_image_radius = section.settings.content_image_radius

  assign product_content_mt = section.settings.product_content_mt
  assign product_content_mt_mobile = section.settings.product_content_mt_mobile
  assign product_content_vertical_align = section.settings.product_content_vertical_align

  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color    

  assign details_custom = section.settings.details_custom
  assign details_font = section.settings.details_font
  assign details_size = section.settings.details_size
  assign details_size_mobile = section.settings.details_size_mobile
  assign details_height = section.settings.details_height
  assign details_color = section.settings.details_color
  assign details_mt = section.settings.details_mt
  assign details_mt_mobile = section.settings.details_mt_mobile

  assign button_text = section.settings.button_text
  assign button_padding_horizontal = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal
  assign button_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign button_padding_vertical = section.settings.button_padding_vertical
  assign button_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign button_radius = section.settings.button_radius
  assign button_border_thickness = section.settings.button_border_thickness
  assign button_border_color = section.settings.button_border_color
  assign button_bg_color = section.settings.button_bg_color  
  assign button_size = section.settings.button_size
  assign button_size_mobile = section.settings.button_size_mobile
  assign button_color = section.settings.button_color
  assign button_hover_color = section.settings.button_hover_color
  assign button_custom = section.settings.button_custom
  assign button_font = section.settings.button_font
  assign button_height = section.settings.button_height
  assign button_border_hover_color = section.settings.button_border_hover_color
  assign button_bg_hover_color = section.settings.button_bg_hover_color
  assign button_mt = section.settings.button_mt
  assign button_mt_mobile = section.settings.button_mt_mobile

  assign count_custom = section.settings.count_custom
  assign count_font = section.settings.count_font
  assign count_size = section.settings.count_size
  assign count_size_mobile = section.settings.count_size_mobile
  assign count_height = section.settings.count_height
  assign count_color = section.settings.count_color    

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ tag_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ details_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ count_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  
  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .featured-body-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: {{ layout_gap_mobile }}px;
  }

  .featured-image-slider-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-area: image;
    aspect-ratio: auto;
  }

  .featured-image-slider-{{ section.id }} {    
    position: relative;    
    height: 100% !important;
    min-width: 0px !important;
    width: 100% !important;  
    border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }} !important;
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px !important;
    overflow: hidden !important;
  }

  .featured-image-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative !important;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
  }

  .featured-image-slide-{{ section.id }} img,
  .featured-image-slide-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .featured-image-slide-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .featured-image-slide-tag-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: 16px;
    left: 16px;
    z-index: 1;
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ tag_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ tag_color }};
    line-height: {{ tag_height }}%;
    text-align: {{ tag_align_mobile }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    font-weight: 700;
  }   

  .featured-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute !important;
    z-index: 1;
    bottom: 10px;
    left: 50% !important;
    transform: translateX(-50%) !important;
    margin: 0px auto !important;
    width: 100% !important;
    max-width: fit-content;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .featured-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
    width: {{ dots_size_mobile }}px !important;
    height: {{ dots_size_mobile }}px !important;
    border: 0px !important;
    background-color: {{ dots_color }} !important;
    opacity: 0.4 !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.swiper-pagination-bullet-active {
    transform: scale(1.3) !important;
    opacity: 1 !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-product-slider-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-area: product;
    aspect-ratio: auto;
  }
    
  .featured-product-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    min-width: 0px !important;
    width: 100% !important;
    position: relative !important;   
    border: {{ product_border_thickness }}px solid {{ product_border_color }} !important;     
    border-radius: {{ product_radius }}px !important;
    background-color: {{ product_bg_color }} !important;
  }

  .featured-product-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block !important;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    display: flex !important;
  }

  .featured-product-slide-body-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    padding: {{ product_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ product_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .featured-product-image-{{ section.id }} {
    border-radius: {{ content_image_radius }}px;
    border: {{ content_image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ content_image_border_color }};
    overflow: hidden;
    max-width: 60%;
  }

  .featured-product-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .featured-product-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .featured-product-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .featured-product-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ product_content_mt_mobile }}px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    width: 100%;
  }
  
  .featured-product-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;   
    max-width: 70%;
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    font-weight: 700;
  }    

  .featured-product-details-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ details_mt_mobile }}px;
    max-width: 70%;
  }

  .featured-product-details-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ details_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ details_color }};
    line-height: {{ details_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }  

  .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ button_mt_mobile }}px;
    padding: {{ button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ button_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ button_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background-color: {{ button_bg_color }};
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    text-decoration: none;
    max-width: fit-content;
    font-size: {{ button_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ button_color }};
    line-height: {{ button_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ button_border_hover_color }};
    background-color: {{ button_bg_hover_color }};
  }

  .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    color: {{ button_hover_color }};
  }

  .featured-product-count-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 30px;
    right: 30px;
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .featured-product-count-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;   
    text-align: center;
    font-size: {{ count_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ count_color }};
    line-height: {{ count_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    z-index: 2;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 10px;
  }

  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 10px;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-lock,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-lock {
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
  }  


  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .featured-body-{{ section.id }} {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
      gap: {{ layout_gap }}px;
    }

    .featured-image-slider-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 1/1;
    }

    .featured-image-slide-tag-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ tag_size }}px;
      text-align: {{ tag_align }};
    }   
    
    .featured-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
      width: {{ dots_size }}px !important;
      height: {{ dots_size }}px !important;
    }    
    
    .featured-product-slider-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 1/1;
    }
  
    .featured-product-slide-body-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ product_padding_vertical }}px {{ product_padding_horizontal }}px !important;
    }

    .featured-product-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ product_content_mt }}px;
    }
    
    .featured-product-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
    }    
    
    .featured-product-details-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ details_mt }}px;
    }

    .featured-product-details-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ details_size }}px;
    }  

    .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ button_mt }}px;
      padding: {{ button_padding_vertical }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ button_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-product-count-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ count_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    }

    .featured-image-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto !important;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if tag_custom %}
  <style>
    .featured-image-slide-tag-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ tag_font.family }}, {{ tag_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ tag_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ tag_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    .featured-product-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if details_custom %}
  <style>
    .featured-product-details-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ details_font.family }}, {{ details_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ details_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ details_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if button_custom %}
  <style>
    .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ button_font.family }}, {{ button_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ button_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ button_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}



{% if count_custom %}
  <style>
    .featured-product-count-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ count_font.family }}, {{ count_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ count_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ count_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if layout_mobile == 'image_content'%}
  <style>
    .featured-body-{{ section.id }} {
      grid-template-areas: 
        "image"
        "product";     
    }
  </style>
{% elsif layout_mobile == 'content_image' %}
  <style>
    .featured-body-{{ section.id }} {
      grid-template-areas: 
        "product"
        "image";     
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if layout == 'image_content'%}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-body-{{ section.id }} {
        grid-template-areas: "image product";       
      }
    }    
  </style>
{% elsif layout == 'content_image' %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-body-{{ section.id }} {
        grid-template-areas: "product image";      
      }
    }   
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if tag_align_mobile == 'left' %}
  <style>
    .featured-image-slide-tag-{{ section.id }} {
      left: 16px; 
      transform: translateX(0%);      
    }
  </style>
{% elsif tag_align_mobile == 'center' %}
  <style>
    .featured-image-slide-tag-{{ section.id }} {
      left: 50%;
      transform: translateX(-50%);   
    }
  </style>  
{% elsif tag_align_mobile == 'right' %}
  <style>
    .featured-image-slide-tag-{{ section.id }} {
      right: 16px;
      transform: translateX(0%);   
    }
  </style>  
{% endif %}

{% if tag_align == 'left' %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-image-slide-tag-{{ section.id }} {
        left: 24px;
        right: auto;
        transform: translateX(0%);   
      }
    }   
  </style>
{% elsif tag_align == 'center' %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-image-slide-tag-{{ section.id }} {
        left: 50%;
        right: auto;      
        transform: translateX(-50%);
      }
    }    
  </style>  
{% elsif tag_align == 'right' %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-image-slide-tag-{{ section.id }} {
        right: 24px;
        left: auto;
        transform: translateX(0%);   
      }
    }   
  </style>  
{% endif %}

{% if dots_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .featured-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex !important;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .featured-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if dots_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9) translateY(-50%);
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        transform: scale(0.9) translateY(-50%);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .featured-image-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
  .featured-image-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .featured-image-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .featured-image-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if content_image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .featured-product-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif content_image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
  .featured-product-image-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif content_image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .featured-product-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .featured-product-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if content_image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-product-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
      }
    }
    
  </style>
{% elsif content_image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-product-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }  
  </style>
{% elsif content_image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-product-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }    
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
     @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-product-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if product_content_vertical_align == "bottom" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-product-slide-body-{{ section.id }} {
        justify-content: space-between;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} featured-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      <div class="featured-body-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="featured-image-slider-wrap-{{ section.id }}">
          <div class="featured-image-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
            <div class="swiper-wrapper">
              {% if collection == blank %}
                {% for block in section.blocks %}
                  <div class="featured-image-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                    {% if block.settings.left_image != blank %}          
                      <img src="{{ block.settings.left_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.left_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>   
                    {% elsif block.settings.product.media.size > 1 %}
                      {% for media in block.settings.product.media %}
                        {% if forloop.index == 2 %}
                          <img src="{{ media | image_url }}" alt="{{ media.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                        {% endif %}
                      {% endfor %}
                    {% elsif block.settings.product.featured_image != blank %}
                      <img src="{{ block.settings.product.featured_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.product.featured_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>            
                    {% else %}
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    {% endif %}  
                    {% if block.settings.tag != blank %}
                      <p class="featured-image-slide-tag-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.tag }}</p>
                    {% elsif block.settings.product.metafields.custom.tag.value != blank %}
                      <p class="featured-image-slide-tag-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.product.metafields.custom.tag.value }}</p>  
                    {% endif %}                 
                  </div>
                {% endfor %}
              {% else %}
                {% for product in collections[collection].products limit: collection_show %}
                  <div class="featured-image-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">                   
                    {% if product.media.size > 1 %}
                      {% for media in product.media %}
                        {% if forloop.index == 2 %}
                          <img src="{{ media | image_url }}" alt="{{ media.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                        {% endif %}
                      {% endfor %}
                    {% elsif product.featured_image != blank %}
                      <img src="{{ product.featured_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ product.featured_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>            
                    {% else %}
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    {% endif %}                     
                    {% if product.metafields.custom.tag.value != blank %}
                      <p class="featured-image-slide-tag-{{ section.id }}">{{ product.metafields.custom.tag.value }}</p>  
                    {% endif %}                 
                  </div>
                {% endfor %}
              {% endif %}
            </div>
            <div class="featured-pagination-{{ section.id }} swiper-pagination"></div>
          </div>
        </div>      
        <div class="featured-product-slider-wrap-{{ section.id }}">
          <div class="featured-product-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
            <div class="swiper-wrapper">
              {% if collection == blank %}
                {% for block in section.blocks %}
                  <div class="featured-product-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide" data-title="{{ block.settings.product.title }}" data-id="{{ block.settings.product.id }}">
                    <div class="featured-product-slide-body-{{ section.id }}">
                      <{% if block.settings.product.url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.product.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="featured-product-image-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.right_image != blank %}
                          <img src="{{ block.settings.right_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.right_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>            
                        {% elsif block.settings.product.featured_image != blank %}
                          <img src="{{ block.settings.product.featured_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.product.featured_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>            
                        {% else %}
                          {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                        {% endif %}
                      </{% if block.settings.product.url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
                      <div class="featured-product-slide-content-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.custom_title != blank %}
                          <p class="featured-product-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.custom_title }}</p>
                        {% elsif block.settings.product != blank %}  
                          <p class="featured-product-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.product.title }}</p>
                        {% endif %}                           
                        {% if block.settings.details != blank %}
                          <div class="featured-product-details-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.details }}</div>                     
                        {% elsif block.settings.product.metafields.custom.specs.value != blank %}
                          <div class="featured-product-details-{{ section.id }}"><p>{{ block.settings.product.metafields.custom.specs.value }}</p></div> 
                        {% endif %}   
                        {% if block.settings.product != blank %}                  
                          <a href="{{ block.settings.product.url }}" class="featured-product-button-{{ section.id }}">{{ button_text }}</a>      
                        {% endif %}                                      
                      </div>                      
                    </div>                      
                  </div>
                {% endfor %}
              {% else %}
                {% for product in collections[collection].products limit: collection_show %}
                  <div class="featured-product-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide" data-title="{{ product.title }}" data-id="{{ product.id }}">
                    <div class="featured-product-slide-body-{{ section.id }}">
                      <a href="{{ product.url }}" class="featured-product-image-{{ section.id }}">                         
                        <img src="{{ product.featured_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ product.featured_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>            
                      </a>
                      <div class="featured-product-slide-content-{{ section.id }}">                        
                        <p class="featured-product-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ product.title }}</p>                                              
                        {% if product.metafields.custom.specs.value != blank %}
                          <div class="featured-product-details-{{ section.id }}"><p>{{ product.metafields.custom.specs.value }}</p></div> 
                        {% endif %}                    
                        <a href="{{ product.url }}" class="featured-product-button-{{ section.id }}">{{ button_text }}</a>                                            
                      </div>                   
                    </div>                      
                  </div>
                {% endfor %}
              {% endif %}
            </div>
            <div class="featured-product-count-{{ section.id }}"><span>1/{{ section.blocks.size }}</span></div>
            <button class="featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
              <span class="animate-icon"></span>
            </button>   
            <button class="featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
              <span class="animate-icon"></span>
            </button>  
          </div>
        </div>      
      </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initFeaturedCollection13() {
    const productCountElement = document.querySelector(`.featured-product-count-{{ section.id }} span`);
    const updateSlideCount = (current, total) => {
      if (productCountElement) {
        productCountElement.textContent = `${current} / ${total}`;
      }
    };
  
    const imageSlider = new Swiper(`.featured-image-slider-{{ section.id }}`, {
      speed: 400,
      loop: true,
      slidesPerView: 1,
      spaceBetween: 0,
      allowTouchMove: true,
      watchSlidesProgress: true,
      preventInteractionOnTransition: true,
      pagination: {
        el: `.featured-pagination-{{ section.id }}`,
        type: "bullets",
        clickable: true,
      }
    });
  
    const productSlider = new Swiper(`.featured-product-slider-{{ section.id }}`, {
      speed: 400,
      loop: true,
      slidesPerView: 1,
      spaceBetween: 0,
      allowTouchMove: true,
      watchSlidesProgress: true,
      preventInteractionOnTransition: true,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: `.featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}`,
        prevEl: `.featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}`,
      }
    });
  
    imageSlider.controller.control = productSlider;
    productSlider.controller.control = imageSlider;
  
    const totalSlides = imageSlider.slides.length;
  
    imageSlider.on('slideChange', () => {
      const currentIndex = imageSlider.realIndex + 1;
      updateSlideCount(currentIndex, totalSlides);
    });
  
    const initialIndex = imageSlider.realIndex + 1;
    updateSlideCount(initialIndex, totalSlides);
  
    let resizeTimeout;
    window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
      clearTimeout(resizeTimeout);
      resizeTimeout = setTimeout(() => {
        imageSlider.update();
        productSlider.update();
        imageSlider.updateSize();
        productSlider.updateSize();
      }, 150);
    });
  }
  
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeaturedCollection13);
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initFeaturedCollection13);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initFeaturedCollection13);
  }
</script>

collection.label: Collection
collection.description: Leave blank to show products from the blocks

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
